name:
Loving my Steam Deck so far. Spider-Man Remastered looks great and is a blast to play. I also started Horizon: Zero Dawn, which is pretty, but definitely has occasional stutters.

My 1TB microSD arrives on Monday, and will be dedicated to EmuDeck. 😎👾

content.html:
Loving my Steam Deck so far. Spider-Man Remastered looks great and is a blast to play. I also started Horizon: Zero Dawn, which is pretty, but definitely has occasional stutters.

My 1TB microSD arrives on Monday, and will be dedicated to EmuDeck. 😎👾

Dairy farms - "the teataverse"
Law offices - "the riskaverse"
Cars for dead people - "the backahearse"

summary: @cleverdevil Amen! I only had to go once for a conference, but I did not like it even a little.(Best thing to happen to me there, though, was a phone call to let me know that I wouldn't have to "go solo" in my law practice because the troublemaker partner was leaving.)

content.html:
@cleverdevil Amen! I only had to go once for a conference, but I did not like it even a little.
(Best thing to happen to me there, though, was a phone call to let me know that I wouldn't have to "go solo" in my law practice because the troublemaker partner was leaving.)
content.value: @cleverdevil Amen! I only had to go once for a conference, but I did not like it even a little.(Best thing to happen to me there, though, was a phone call to let me know that I wouldn't have to "go solo" in my law practice because the troublemaker partner was leaving.)

name: I’ve been using a self-hosted feed aggregator and Reeder, switching away from #microsub alternatives. As much as I love microsub, I think it is fighting a losing battle and is unlikely to gain traction for lack of support.

content.html: I’ve been using a self-hosted feed aggregator and Reeder, switching away from #microsub alternatives. As much as I love microsub, I think it is fighting a losing battle and is unlikely to gain traction for lack of support.
content.value: I’ve been using a self-hosted feed aggregator and Reeder, switching away from #microsub alternatives. As much as I love microsub, I think it is fighting a losing battle and is unlikely to gain traction for lack of support.

summary: @jonathan Been super happy with my “homegrown” feed reader, a “simple” responsive web app that nevertheless supports some of Microsub. (Not a huge fan of Microsub per se.) What’d be great is if more “traditional” readers started supporting additional feed formats, and, possibly, Micropub

content.html: @jonathan Been super happy with my “homegrown” feed reader, a “simple” responsive web app that nevertheless supports some of Microsub. (Not a huge fan of Microsub per se.) What’d be great is if more “traditional” readers started supporting additional feed formats, and, possibly, Micropub
content.value: @jonathan Been super happy with my “homegrown” feed reader, a “simple” responsive web app that nevertheless supports some of Microsub. (Not a huge fan of Microsub per se.) What’d be great is if more “traditional” readers started supporting additional feed formats, and, possibly, Micropub

name: One of my favorite family traditions when we are in our desert home is pizza night. Making the dough and sauce from scratch, everyone picking their toppings, and firing the pizzas outside in the Ooni oven. Just a blast!

name:
Andor S1E8 was the darkest 45 minutes of Star Wars ever. They’ve done a wonderful job of capturing the insidious nature of authoritarianism.

The elite banter at a cocktail party, excusing the atrocities of the Emperor because at least he “speaks his mind.”

Sound familiar?

content.html:

The elite banter at a cocktail party, excusing the atrocities of the Emperor because at least he “speaks his mind.”

Sound familiar?

The elite banter at a cocktail party, excusing the atrocities of the Emperor because at least he “speaks his mind.”

Sound familiar?
